mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_tb (team_name, team_location, team_capacity, team_introduce, team_pic_url, age_id, gender_id, position_id, sport_id, created_at) VALUES (#{teamName}, #{teamLocation}, #{teamCapacity}, #{teamIntroduce}, #{teamPicUrl}, #{ageId}, #{genderId}, #{positionId}, #{sportId}, now())
mapper.select: select * from team_tb t join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id

select * from team_tb t join sport_tb s on t.sport_id = s.id join age_tb a on t.age_id = a.id join gender_tb g on t.gender_id = g.id join position_tb p on t.position_id = p.id join captain_tb c on c.team_id = t.id
